hero.title: Transform Your Images Into Perfect SVG Vectors
hero.subtitle: Free online image to SVG converter. Professional quality vectorization with no watermarks, no signup required.
hero.feature1Desc: Convert images to SVG in seconds

tool.title: Convert Your Images to SVG
tool.description: Upload any image and watch it transform into a beautiful, scalable vector graphic

settings.title: Settings
settings.colorNote: Groups similar colors for easier editing

preview.title: Preview
preview.previewNote: SVG previews may appear slightly cropped in preview mode only.
preview.uploadPrompt: Upload an image to see the preview
preview.convertingNote: This may take a few seconds

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to perfect vector graphics
howItWorks.step1Desc: Drag and drop or click to upload your PNG, JPG, or other image format. Supports files up to 10MB.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose quality preset, color mode, and fine-tune detail level, smoothing, and optimization.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Click convert and get your perfectly vectorized SVG in seconds. Edit in any vector software.

footer.brandDesc: Professional-quality image vectorization, completely free. Transform your images into scalable SVG vectors in seconds.
